org.apache.mesos.scheduler.plan.strategy

Interface Strategy<C extends Element>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - is the type of Elements to which the Strategy applies.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CanaryStrategy, DependencyStrategy, InterruptableStrategy, ParallelStrategy, RandomStrategy, SerialStrategy

    public interface Strategy<C extends Element>
    A strategy indicates which Elements are ready to be processed. It may be interrupted such that it will indicate that no elements are available for processing. To resume normal operation proceed() may be called.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Collection<C> getCandidates(Element<C> parentElement, java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> dirtyAssets) 
      void interrupt()
      A call to interrupt indicates to a Strategy that it should not produce Elements when getCandidates(Element, Collection) is called.
      boolean isInterrupted()
      Indicates whether a Strategy is interrupted or not.
      void proceed()
      If a Strategy is interrupted this should now allow a Strategy to produce candidates on calls to getCandidates(Element, Collection).

    • Method Detail

      • getCandidates

        java.util.Collection<C> getCandidates(Element<C> parentElement,
                                      java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> dirtyAssets)

      • interrupt

        void interrupt()
        A call to interrupt indicates to a Strategy that it should not produce Elements when getCandidates(Element, Collection) is called. If a Strategy is already interrupted, this should have no effect.

      • proceed

        void proceed()
        If a Strategy is interrupted this should now allow a Strategy to produce candidates on calls to getCandidates(Element, Collection). If the Strategy was already interrupted a call to proceed should have no effect.

      • isInterrupted

        boolean isInterrupted()
        Indicates whether a Strategy is interrupted or not.
        Returns:
        true if a Strategy is interrupted, false otherwise.
